contents.text: Thank you for calling Avatier in the East Bay, where we automate IT operations with secure identity management.
For sales and product information, press 1.
To speak with our sales team, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our sales team. Thank you for your patience.

navigationGoals: Get detailed pricing and package options from a sales rep
As a veteran-owned security contractor, I want to speak with a sales rep about purchasing your identity management solution.
Speak with sales to discuss API licensing options for your identity management platform
I’d like to talk to someone about buying your identity management software and pricing options.
I want to discuss licensing tiers and academic discounts for implementing Avatier in my university’s physics lab.

contents.text: To request a product demo or trial, press 2.
Please hold while we transfer you to the team handling product demos and trials.

navigationGoals: Arrange a live demo or trial of the identity management platform
I’d like to arrange a trial of the Avatier platform so I can evaluate its features before committing to a purchase.
Schedule a trial of the identity governance solution to evaluate its access provisioning features
I need to arrange a hands-on trial or demonstration of your product.
I want to schedule a demo or start a trial of Avatier’s identity management platform to test in our student research group.

contents.text: For technical support and customer service, press 2.
For technical support and troubleshooting, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to technical support.

navigationGoals: Resolve a login or integration issue with technical support
I’m unable to log into my admin portal and need to speak with technical support to resolve the issue.
Troubleshoot a failed SSO authentication handshake in our directory integration
I’m having trouble logging in and need technical support to walk me through it.
I need help diagnosing and resolving a multi-factor authentication issue in our department’s Avatier setup.

contents.text: For account management and billing inquiries, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our account management and billing department.

navigationGoals: Update billing information and clarify recent invoice charges
I need to review my latest invoice and update the payment method on my account.
Update my enterprise subscription plan and retrieve the latest billing invoice for my account
I have questions about my account charges and need help with my bill.
I need to update billing details and adjust the number of user licenses on our lab’s existing Avatier subscription.
